Funked by Moot Booxle

10 Jan 2017

Having recently acquired an ARP module, I've been binging YouTube videos to get a sense for its tonal possibilities.

Here are some of my favorites by the funky Moot Booxle.

1) 15 minutes of high-quality free-form noodling

 

2) Demo of patches from original ARP manual

 

3) ARP vs Minimoog Bass Face-off

 

4) ARP v Minimoog Round 2
